name: Tobias Gutmann
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I use JS/TS professionally and for fun side projects.
what_can_i_contribute: Some ideas about what I would like to share: Effective editing of code using VI/M or a plugin for your favorite code editor; My first contact with an SSG: Creating a blog using Gatbsy and adding interactivity with cloud functions; Helpful in-browser debugging tricks using Google Chrome Developer Tools; (...)
